trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is an internal error in the execution engine of the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod når det er en intern feil i motoren for kjøring av common language runtime.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: There is no non-obsolete alternative to ExecutionEngineException.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen ikke-foreldet alternativ til ExecutionEngineException.

trans-unit.source: If further execution of your application cannot be sustained, use the <xref:System.Environment.FailFast%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mer kjøring av programmet ikke kan være sustained, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Environment.FailFast%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Environment.FailFast%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Internal error occurred."
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>for den nye forekomsten til en system-angitt melding som beskriver feilen, slik som "Intern feil."</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen tar hensyn til den gjeldende kulturen i systemet.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>.</xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| En nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Lokaliserte feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the new exception using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for den nye unntak ved hjelp av den `message` parameteren.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i `message` er ment å forstå av mennesker.

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren for denne konstruktøren kreves for å sikre at denne strengen er lokalisert for den gjeldende kulturen i systemet.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>.</xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| En nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som beskriver problemet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ExecutionEngineException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og en referanse til det interne unntaket er årsaken til dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak som er registrert som en direkte resultatet av et tidligere unntak må inkludere en referanse til det tidligere unntaket i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen returnerer samme verdi som er sendt til konstruktøren, eller en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) Hvis den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen leverer ikke internt unntak verdien til konstruktøren.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>.</xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Referansen for det indre unntaket. | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `innerException` -parameteren er ikke en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic), gjeldende unntaket blir opphøyd i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> blokken som behandler det interne unntaket.
